basic.name: Yang Chenhui
basic.motto: It's never too late to do what you love
basic.address: Building 7, North Area of Aohaiminyue, Changping District, Beijing

profile.title: About Me
profile.item1: A dedicated developer with a passion for programming and product implementation. Particularly interested in cross-platform solutions, computer networks, and emerging technologies like Rust. Driven by the challenge of turning concepts into practical applications.
profile.item2: Demonstrated strong hands-on abilities through various DIY projects, including hardware assembly and repairs. Particularly passionate about smart home solutions, NAS deployment, and technology exploration.
profile.item3: Maintains an active lifestyle through skiing, photography, and badminton. Combines recreational pursuits with social responsibility through regular community service and volunteer activities.

bupt.name: Beijing University of Posts and Telecommunications
